#summary Everything you need to do a field test.

= Introduction =

This page is a list of everything that needs to be taken to an airboat field test.

= List =

==Airboat==
    * Boat
      * incl. hull, ebox & shroud
      * Velcro straps to secure ebox
    * Spare battery
    * Fishing line
==Control==
    * Router
    * Router power cable
    * Laptop
    * Battery pack
==Documentation==
    * Still camera
    * Video camera
    * Tripod
==Misc==
    * Extra tape
    * Spare battery
    * Screw driver
